newsitem.title: USA: AmeriGas unit to close Cheyenne office.
newsitem.headline: AmeriGas unit to close Cheyenne office.

text.p: AmeriGas Partners LP said on Tuesday that its Propane Transport International unit will close its office in Cheyenne, Wyo., and move its functions to the unit's Houston office.
The move is part of AmeriGas Partners' consolidation of its rail, trucking, pipeline and terminal operations, the company said.
AmeriGas markets propane from 600 locations in 44 states. It is 58 percent owned by UGI Corp.
